    :1v1v1 Dhandhanggula //0//om̐ avighnanam astu ya nama siḍəm //0//


    [line 1] apasaṁ tabe kamy amariñci [line 2] hamijilakən tatyani smara [line 3] ḍpuri sabda kaṁ pinet [line 4] muḍa tan vri ri la1vku [line 5] ragha mily aṁi1vkət karasmin [line 6] ṣapun tan iṁapura [line 7] dera saṁ tame vruḥ, [line 8] kumavi haṙsamet raras [line 9] kumaliṁa 1+lad. v1+j1+l1+ sand1+ [line 10] t1+las1+ra 01.001

    [line 1] 1vvirasaṁṁnira saṁṁ adi [line 2] ḍaṁḍaṁgula təmbaṁni vacana [line 3] tan riṁṁ pupuḥ tirvan amet [line 4] mahaṙdikani təmbuṁ, [line 5] panalamuṙ medrani budi [line 6] raghagəṁ kalṁəṁṁan. [line 7] vuṙyyan manaḥ jinu1vm. [line 8] syaḥ śiṙṇa cipta ṁambara [line 9] pingatanityasa rusit [line 10] paṁnalemor i driya 01.002

    [line 1] ø jumavanut svarani sukṣmalit [line 2] pan alamuṙ cipta daṙpa muk.skaṙ [line 3] ḍibya1v huyaṁ kemuṙ make [line 4] svəḥ dyatan malulut [line 5] kiraṁ yoga pramada lviḥ, [line 6] vinoteṁ kanuragan. [line 7] jñaṇa salaḥ surup. [line 8] ḍaṙsaṇa tr̥ṣṇa nityasaḥ [line 9] tan kagivaṁ sumək pa1vmacanaṇi siḥ [line 10] dyaniṁ amriḥ carita 01.003

    [line 1] ø nahan ṣaṁsiptaniṁ amarici [line 2] saṁṁ amaṁgiḥ tusṭa moṁ kaviṙyan [line 3] riṁ vilatikta pranaḥe [line 4] pralabda prabu vəruḥ [line 5] vatə1vk dana mule kasiḥ sasi [line 6] hasikəp kasusilan [line 7] pramaṙtya budy alus [line 8] puspita nəmpu kakala [line 9] kasub kar̥ṁə hapuṇya hadana lviḥ [line 10] boga sadana lumraḥ 01.004

    [line 1] ø saṁ kakaṁ histri kaliḥ hamukti [line 2] kapal. smu mə2rdenira śaṁ suka [line 3] mankin tan. ketaṁ harine [line 4] ki siṁamada lusuḥ [line 5] siṁ voṁ sudi hamilasani [line 6] saya tuva riṁ vayaḥ [line 7] sasipta vri laku, [line 8] nisṭani ragha karasa2r [line 9] viniveka duka nasta2rpane lviḥ [line 10] syarasani vaṙdaya 01.009

    [line 1] ø ṁ kadaṁ vr̥gane tan ana sudi [line 2] siṁamada sinəgya panas [line 3] maṙmmaniṁ anistan. vri deṣa, [line 4] parani laku [line 5] l1+ṁa :2v2v iimpus tan pamit. [line 6] luṁha sakiṁ pradesa [line 7] lpas lampaḥhipun. [line 8] ri vanapriga kahaṙsa [line 9] duṙgama ḃaya kevəḥ vyaṙ tan kahisṭi [line 10] dahat gəṁniṁ kalaran. 01.010

    [line 1] ø 2vsaya lpas tan ana2v katoliḥ [line 2] cipta laṁ1+t lampus niṁ katr̥sṇa [line 3] hanṣəl. ragha dan liṁe katuvun. vakisun [line 4] ṣaṣayani ragha tan ṣipi [line 5] tan. vruḥ riṁ :2v2v rama rena, [line 6] nastapa huvu huvuḥ [line 7] haṁiṁ kavaśaha huga [line 8] raganiṁsun. mon kagugu [line 9] kagoraveṁ riṁ vṁi tuvas siṁit2v. [line 10] ragha tan vruḥ ṁenaka 01.011

    [line 1] ø kunaṁ yen ana kəsəliṁṁ ati [line 2] baya luhuṁ haṁuśiya vana [line 3] make, nusupa riṁ ṁo make [line 4] pjaḥha luhuṙriṁ2v gunuṁ [line 5] yan mijila vacanana niki [line 6] navinivedaka riṁ nala [line 7] rumupe riṁṁ ayu, [line 8] datan kavaṙnaha riṁ maṙga [line 9] talaś laris lampanva2v hasaṁu taṁis [line 10] prasta jəṁ riṁ pravata 01.012

    [line 1] ø hamaṁgiḥ ḍukuḥ velahaṙja [line 2] mikiṁṁakən maṙggā [line 3] mulat ki siṁamada śaksana rere [line 4] jəṁ rapuḥ2v cipta maliḥ [line 5] kapaṁgiḥ saṁ ta ligiḥ riṁ made, [line 6] sambrama ki paṁuvusan [line 7] hatanya risni vacana , [line 8] bageya saṁ tami ḍataṁ mara2v ke, [line 9] hañaṙ vikan. ṁoṁ kaki, [line 10] lvir tanma priyatin polahe [line 11] laḥ bapa maratiya, [line 12] vriṁ naya ki siṁamada [line 13] sami haliṁgiḥ, ki2v habət liṁnya taken, [line 14] di sakan. teṁśun kaki [line 15] sumahuṙr alon mavaraḥ pinakane 01.013

    [line 1] ø tuhu tan. vikan vr̥ti2vnta kami [line 2] ṁoṁ bapā tanya śvapa namanta, [line 3] varaḥ jati kami make, [line 4] siṁamadya vriṁ smu [line 5] saṁ tabe hanakta kaki, [line 6] hapajar i nama :3r3r1 [line 7] navi tuhu tan vruḥ [line 8] siṁamadḍya haraniṁ vvaṁ, [line 9] dahat. deniṁ hamukti nastapa ḷviḥ [line 10] kavlas aṙśa nityasa 01.014

    [line 1] ø haṁuśi ka3rdaṁ vr̥ga tan ana sudi [line 2] tuhu dinaliḥ tikna viruda, [line 3] datan ana sudi kabeḥ, [line 4] pjaḥ bapa rama hibu [line 5] karakasa gvan i kari [line 6] ki3r habət mavacana, [line 7] haṁr̥ś. tvasky aruṁu, [line 8] śamono denta vacana, [line 9] ki paṁuvusann aliṁ haṁr̥s. raśaniṁ a3rti [line 10] ki baru mareneya 01.015

    [line 1] ø saṁ siksa prapta vot.skaṙ [line 2] punapi kaṙyya ṁave bvaha [line 3] hadan pala bojanā depunaśereg3r.     [line 1] ø gantaṁ hupama raga, [line 2] kḷəm. kneṁ samudra [line 3] maṁsa livata hisine [line 4] yen uvu takəripun [line 5] hamvəhi lara kaseḥsiḥ [line 6] mo3vn. ton iṁ aniṁ3v sukāniṁ amukti rame [line 7] tan apik pranaḥhiṁ laḃa, [line 8] riṁ gunuṁ riṁṁ ampaḥ [line 9] pasnətane havrat kalabane [line 10] haṁahub. soṙni pisis [line 11] niṣṭa dama :4r4r1tan ana, pulakr̥tinipun. 01.023

    [line 1] ø vaniḥ bapa nata1+ṁ akikin [line 2] hakveḥ ḃava lkas. nora tapa [line 3] milupra hiṁ apagave [line 4] śavaniḥ saṁ aviku [line 5] hakeḥ silib ri la4vku kaki [line 6] havis putuseṁ virasa [line 7] pamatəsiṁ vuvus [line 8] adikara maṁan. kla [line 9] tan lyen kaṁ denṣadya suka viṙyya sugiḥ [line 10] hamriḥ yoliḥhiṁ brata 01.029

    [line 1] ø siṁamaḍa r̥ṁə tutuṙ mami [line 2] riṁ anmu rasa haja viha [line 3] natarana sabda mule [line 4] hatapa dentumulu4vs [line 5] manavaṙsa muliḥ4v hamukti [line 6] saṁ viku yen atatas [line 7] tan ulahanisun [line 8] manava lipuṙ kaṁ manaḥta, [line 9] budi lupa mava kaṙyya cipta karasmin [line 10] aṙsa valuya ṁampaḥ 01.032

    [line 1] ø haneṁ ku:5r5r1na hanunuṁgal ṣakti [line 2] hatyata kavasa lumkas [line 3] hakumandaṙma natare [line 4] sita pabrata dentutuṙ [line 5] dapa denya maṁun kasaktin [line 6] kasr̥k vinoṙr i vighna [line 7] hyaṁ anaṁga ṁimuṙ [line 8] sida5r pinaliḥh ajñana [line 9] salaḥ simpaṁ ciptane vinor iṁ asi [line 10] manasaṙ reṁ ala 01.033

    [line 1] ø datan kavasa kr̥tini budi [line 2] hanuṁgal. jñana mareṁṁ ala, [line 3] vvaṙ ta tutuṙ tanpa gave [line 4] sṙniṁ lulut ṣumaput. [line 5] pamacanani rara śakti [line 6] havali ma5rreṁ ampaḥ, [line 7] keśaḥ kapalayu [line 8] punika mevəhi brata, [line 9] iṁəttiṁət ṣiṁamada hayo lali [line 10] den.vruḥ riṁ lava5rn. rovaṁ 01.034

    [line 1] ø lampaḥ hala hanak mami [line 2] kapuraṁ deniṁ kr̥tisamaya, [line 3] śarira yen saṁarane [line 4] tan vuruṁṁa katmu, [line 5] hanacad. r̥5rgəpən iṁṁ ati [line 6] hapan. vətuniṁ duta [line 7] makoliya tutuṙ [line 8] tan koniṁa maniṁ ulaḥ [line 9] saṁ praśida tuhu vinady alampaḥhi [line 10] budi ta5rn kaslan 01.035

    [line 1] ø vaspadakən pekaṁ vas.mṙti [line 2] haja tiniru viku goman iṁ daraḥ [line 3] yyaṁkta ñoloṁ baśarane [line 4] saṁ hyaṁṁ agama putu [line 5] śa :6r6r1rira sama hakikin. [line 6] ñana dipunatuva, [line 7] ragəkap kaṁ pamutus [line 8] mapan vus praptame rasa, [line 9] duluṙrana kr̥ti jatmikaja silib, [line 10] pe6rt sarasaniṁ taya 01.036

    [line 1] ø siṁamada gaṙjiteṁṁ ati [line 2] manampani vṁaniki śvara, [line 3] vira cipta mirage [line 4] makva maṁgiḥ pamuvus. [line 5] tutuṙ lviḥ mavara6rḥ yukti [line 6] śabda paruvat mala, [line 7] siṁamada muvus [line 8] paṁeran tulusakna [line 9] dera varaḥ kacaṙyya rasaniṁṁ ati [line 10] manira nuta lampaḥ6r 01.037

    [line 1] ø yen sirameta riṁ luhuṙriṁ vukiṙ [line 2] nora kapaṁgiḥ jatiniṁ śabda, [line 3] tapa boṁoḥ kaky arane [line 4] havis kaṁ vruḥ halaku [line 5] jumnəṁā6r saṁ vru riṁ gati [line 6] saṁ tapa meṁadiya, [line 7] tan kabəteṁ vuvus [line 8] mevə kaṁ jati vikana, [line 9] nadyan hudakṣinahā denipunkari6r [line 10] tan amāṁgiḥha lampaḥ 01.038

    [line 1] ø lviḥ hutamaniṁ tapa [line 2] saṁ vruḥ pamutusi tapa [line 3] di ta pr̥naḥhaihiya panḍitarane [line 4] nora bava saṁ r̥si [line 5] muliḥ tutuṙ6r valakā tan saṁsaya hame [line 6] tann aṁel kasniṁ tapa, [line 7] śira saṁṁ amet kasidan., [line 8] haṁumanduṙma lavaṙ brata niṙ kabeḥ [line 9] sena6rka muṙvva kitri [line 10] jati pralina tanpa mastu galaṙre 01.039

    [line 1] ø kaliṁṁane vuvusku kaki [line 2] havis tuhvaniṁṁ amaṁun tapa, [line 3] akve viku papa:6v6v1 rante [line 4] kalavisaya ginuṁ [line 5] kanuragan kaṁ denulati [line 6] havis amruḥha śonya, [line 7] haṁi kaviṙyyan denguṁ [line 8] haṁukviḥ daṙmma kala6vban [line 9] mayoga samady amriḥ vijili kitri [line 10] daṙmma kaśukavakvan. 01.040

    [line 1] ø tuhu panutuniṁ hyaṁ hamr̥di [line 2] ki paṁuvusan., n ada6vn avaraḥ [line 3] savṁi tan ana kule [line 4] ki siṁamadḍa muvus [line 5] rani aki vinaraḥ jati [line 6] hayvage kumaliṁa, [line 7] savaṁn iṁ pamuvus.6v [line 8] mevəḥ kaṁ jatv avaraha [line 9] tvasniṁ rasā masa vuruṁa kapaṁgiḥ, [line 10] lamon. kṙtasamaya 01.041

    [line 1] ø vaniḥ saṁ vruḥ vivaraniṁṁ aji [line 2] ti6vnata glariṁ mahapadma, [line 3] pann iya hiku ḍapure [line 4] pati patitisipun [line 5] pik vinaṙna rakutiṁ kavi [line 6] pupuse kumalamaṙ [line 7] vvi6vte makin tan vruḥ [line 8] havis bapa kaṁ vikana, [line 9] saṁṁ atapā riṁ sukma jñana virati [line 10] vruḥ panuṁgaliṁ śabda 01.042

    [line 1] ø prasidakna lampaḥta6v kaki [line 2] husinən. sira saṁ yogiśvara, [line 3] saṁ mahapurusa vri reḥ, [line 4] hana pamitraniṁsun [line 5] halampaḥhi munindra lviḥ [line 6] maka6vdiniṁ pravata, [line 7] kaṁ minaka guru, [line 8] liganiṁṁ adi patapan., [line 9] śukla pavitra viku bramanacari [line 10] jajaka hudaksina 01.043

    [line 1] ø titire sampun karuṁu [line 2] vr̥ta pasaṙ hañampahi [line 3] singuḥ manis gulane [line 4] kalapa, vinaveṁsarajuruḥ [line 5] manis manisireṁ kilaṁ [line 6] pyuḥ vutaḥ tumiḃeṁ sari [line 7] ciptaniṁ haṁla ṁuru [line 8] sinəguḥ ḃa85vya hamanis. 07.107

    [line 1] ø niskaraṇa sabda hiku [line 2] kaṁvr̥ta sampun kaṁḃummi [line 3] ḍenira saṁ anmu reḥ [line 4] vinor iṁ ulat lan guyu [line 5] ḍene lamon ṣami vikan [line 6] anista sampun karihi [line 7] noraṁel ṣaṁ anmu [line 8] gumlar i sila85vyukti07.108


    //0// sampuniṁ anulaṙva kavi ri jəṁ saṁ hyaṁṁ aṙdi kasihan imbaṁ puṙva mandaraghni gəgəṙ i vanagaṁgu rare hanom lagi hasisinahu masaḥ kumalamaṙ ta ḍr̥man ṣakaniṁ a85vli tan porat pakṣa kumavi hanulis tanpa tut i sipat vr̥ḍaḥ ṁkṣa rasmi gitiṁə nəmut gatəl ṣampun kiraṁ puṁapura pukulun kaṁ sudy amaca lavan ṣaṁ amihaṙsa denpatuta dene85v saṁ vicakṣana saṁ kavi kara samakta rahayu kuraṁ denvuvuḥhana lviḥ den loṁana pukulun prasadu ṁuvusan vulan ṣaḍa vuku tambiṙ haṁṁgara kasiḥ duk ṣinurat vulan nəm

    Edited by Kartika Setyawati
